description: Allow you to manage the credentials stored in your Nextcloud Passman app. This is an Android app for the Nextcloud password manager Passman. This app is only compatible with Passman V2.x or higher. Features * Setup app (enter the nextcloud server settings or use SSO) * App start password option based on the android user authentication * View, add, rename and delete vaults * Login to vault * Display credential list * View, add, edit and delete credentials * Add, download and delete files * OTP generation * Basic Android autofill implementation * Password generator * Encrypted offline cache * Encrypted stored vault and cloud connection passwords Requirements * Nextcloud * Nextcloud Passman App
